title: Beginning and termination of extended benefit period
context: ยง383-173 Beginning and termination of extended benefit period. Whenever an extended benefit period is to become effective in this State as a result of a state &ldquo;on&rdquo; indicator, or an extended benefit period is to be terminated in this State as a result of a state &ldquo;off&rdquo; indicator, the director shall make an appropriate public announcement. [L 1971, c 187, pt of ยง13; am L 1982, c 58, ยง3]
